Message:
To protect a master under
the cloak of darkness.
Such a role was given
to a clan of shadows.

I was a shadow.
Even more, a shadow to
one of the Shogun’s children—
the Princess.

Apparently, her life had been
threatened well before
she was born, and all of
her siblings assassinated.

It’s no exaggeration to say that
we shadows were born to
keep the Princess alive.

We were once wanderers,
but taken in and given
a home by the shogunate.

To repay this great debt,
we will indeed die
if it means protecting them!

Such a duty was everything
to my clan of shadows...
